items.text: angling in with the arm once more, worked towards backward square leg
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: A.Balaji: "Sorry I missed out. Why is 127 so more important for Kayes? " -- That would give him the record for the most runs in a three-match series
items.text: fuller around leg stump, pushed towards long-on
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Mahneel: "Call me sadistic but I'm glad that the partnership got broken. Didn't want them to break Mahmudullah and Shakib's record of the highest BD stand, that partnership has a different and more meaningful impact!"
items.text: pitched up outside off, driven towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Abdullah: "31.1 Why is it that only 4 wides is counted but batsman is switched? " -- One wide and they ran three, hence four runs in all and the batsmen switched ends
items.text: fuller outside off, driven towards extra cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "The ones supporting Soumya shouldn't be so elated at a century against Zimbabwe. His failures are way too many against quality attack on difficult wickets."
items.text: length ball, just outside off, pushed towards cover-point
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it hard but ends up hitting it straight to the cover fielder
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short of length and keeps low, Mushfiqur was playing back but adjusts well to punch it towards extra cover, a bit of chuckle by him after the ball
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball but down the leg side
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

items.text: floated outside off, steered towards short third man
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: a low full toss outside off, Mushfiqur works it away towards long-on and keeps the strike
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, driven towards long-off
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball, goes back and flicks it towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Williams to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Ashif: "@Tasmeem Yes soumya's century against Zimbabwe is not going to be graded as one of his best but definitely will definitely boost his confidence. Soumya has always been a touch player and all he was lacking was some confidence. He will grab that with both hands."
items.text: length ball, just outside off, sweeps it towards square leg
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Md Nazmus Sakib: "@Tasneem: but this innings surely build his confidence "
items.text: arm-ball, pitching just outside off, comes forward and dead-bats
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: another one goes with the arm, comes forward to defend, gets an inside edge on the pads, an appeal for lbw but denied
items.shortText: Williams to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText:
AnamBMDF: "Hello Zim bowlers. Thank you so far. PLEASE don't spoil this occassion with extra runs (plenty of wide and no balls today) henceforth. We're ready for a standing ovation for Imrul (for making a record of highest runs in a three ODI series)."

Bashet : "Can anybody please tell Mushfiq not take single on the last of the over! We want Kayes to play. He doesn't get the chance always! "

Tiripano now, around the wicket
items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, defended
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: slower bouncer around leg stump, helped away towards fine leg
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: akshay: "kayes 332* so far in this series.. whats the previous record... hmm" -- The record is still with Babar Azam (360 runs)
items.text: length ball, around off, defended towards covers
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Milad: "Kayes isn't going to get 127,he needs 29 off of 48 remaining. Mushy is going to get in the way. "
items.text: short of length outside off, waits for it before opening the face of the bat to run it towards third man
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short of length around rib cage, dabbed towards fine leg to bring up his fourth ODI hundred
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: fuller and wider and slashed away towards cover boundary for four
items.postText: Akshay will take you to the end of the match
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.preText: Thanks, Hemant. Bangladesh have been ruthless tonight. That's not a quality you often associate with them.
items.text: shoulders arms as this one skips down leg
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 2 wides

items.text: full, slid into middle, gets forward and blocks
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short, straightening on off, cut to deep point
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
